<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs=""
>
[The Desert](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2505)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 74</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Desert_ signifies enduring passage through trying circumstances. As long as _The Desert_ is invested, you are immune to the effects of [temperatures](/Rules.aspx?ID=642) ranging from extreme cold to extreme heat, and can [hold your breath](/Rules.aspx?ID=468) and [go without food and water](/Rules.aspx?ID=537) for twice as long as normal.

<document level="2" id="action-2051" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: The Desert
